instrument_unique_identifier.description: Lab-specific asset tag or unique identifier for the physical piece of equipment. Instrument Primary Key.

instrument_type.description: General category of the instrument (e.g., Confocal Microscope, DNA Sequencer, Mass Spectrometer, Flow Cytometer).

instrument_manufacturer.description: Name of the company that manufactured the instrument.

instrument_model.description: Specific model name or number provided by the manufacturer.

serial_number.description: Manufacturer's unique serial number for the specific instrument unit.

key_hardware_specifications.description: Critical, relatively static hardware details (e.g., Available lasers/filters, camera type, mass analyzer type).

core_software_firmware_version.description: Version of the instrument's primary operating system or control software (if relatively static).

location.description: Physical location of the instrument (e.g., Building, Room Number, Bench).

link_to_calibration_maintenance_log.description: URI or path to records of standard calibration procedures and maintenance history (not run-specific settings).

date_acquired_installed.description: Date the instrument was acquired or put into service in the lab.

created_by.description: User or system that created this metadata record.

last_modified_by.description: User or system that last modified this metadata record.
